text: Poliaenus hesperus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Chemsak and Linsley in 1988. It is known from Mexico.BioLib.cz - Poliaenus hesperus. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Pogonocherini Category:Beetles described in 1988
title: Poliaenus hesperus
